questions.question: THE PROCESS IN WHICH, REMOVAL OF MATERIAL IN THE FORM OF CHIP FROM THE WORKPIECE IS CALLED
TO ACHIEVE A DESIRE GEOMETRY SHAPE OF THE WORKPIECE, THE MACHINE TOOL HAS

answers.a: To control the workpiece-cutting tool positional relationship
answers.b: To provide relative motion between tool and workpiece
answers.c: To provide appropriate cutting speed and feed

questions.question: DATA PROCESSING UNIT (DPU) IS A PART OF
IN CASE OF POINT TO POINT (PTP) MOTION IN NC MACHINE TOOL

answers.a: The motion remain continue and the task is performed
answers.b: The motion does not stopped and the task is not performed
answers.c: The motion is stopped and the task is performed
answers.d: The motion is stopped and task is not performed

questions.question: WOOD CNC ROUTER ARE DIFFERENT THAN CNC METAL CUTTING MACHINES BY

answers.a: The CNC wood router typically spins faster
answers.b: The CNC wood router is a low end hobby grade machines typically uses smaller tool
answers.c: The CNC wood router is preferred for non metal
